document_data.name: '''Enhance Maneuverability'''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Enhance maneuverability''''' was an [[alteration]] [[wizard]] [[spell]] that altered the maneuverability of a single [[spelljammer]].
document_data.Effects: Within {{SI|10|yard|long=yes}} of the caster, this spell could either enhance or decrease by a single degree the maneuverability of a spelljammer. Only one spelljammer, with a spatial tonnage scaling with the power of the caster), could be affected for up to four or more minutes. This effect was not cumulative with other castings of the spell.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a [[material component]] to cast. This took the form of a [[vial]] of wind from an [[air]]-based world,
